__e: Christmas Eve on a rooftop, saw a chimney, my whole brain just went, "What the hell!"
And then one of 'em went over,got the thing from the fireplace, he started hitting them with it.
All I know is, 20 years ago, if you'd put us in a beautiful room with a fireplace and a big bed and it rained all day,
Did you stuff your wife in someone else's chimney?
- From what I've seen, it seems unlikely that bedroom fireplace was ever used.
- What about? - Oh. How we used to roast chestnuts round the other fire and what a lot has happened since.
